main event: A glowing, metallic disc-shaped object was observed over Las Vegas, New Mexico for 2-3 minutes on October 8, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as a shiny, metallic disc about 30-40 feet in diameter.
The object appeared to be stationary at first, then accelerated at a high rate of speed and disappeared.
The sighting was reported by a civilian to USAF Headquarters in Indianapolis, Indiana.
